mapper.update: update shoes set shoesname = #{shoesname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, catalogid = #{catalogid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sales = #{sales,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isdropoff = #{isdropoff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adddate = #{adddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shoesdetails = #{shoesdetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where shoesid = #{shoesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select shoesid, shoesname, catalogid, sales, isdropoff, adddate, shoesdetails, label from shoes
select shoes.shoesid,shoes.shoesname,shoes.isdropoff,shoes.adddate,shoespic.picaddress,shoessku.quantity from shoes,shoespic,shoessku
select DISTINCT shoes.shoesid,shoes.shoesname,shoessku.price from shoes INNER JOIN shoessku on shoes.shoesid=shoessku.shoesid where shoessku.quantity > 0

select DISTINCT shoes.shoesid,shoes.shoesname,shoessku.price,shoessku.quantity,shoessku.ticketprice,shoes.label from shoes INNER JOIN shoessku on shoes.shoesid=shoessku.shoesid where shoes.shoesid=#{shoesid} limit 1
select picaddress from shoespic where shoesid=#{shoesid}
select skuid from shoessku where shoesid=#{shoesid}
select * from splink where shoesid=#{shoesid}
select skuid from shoessku where shoesid=#{shoesid} and skuproperty like ${str} limit 1
select colorpicaddredd from colorpic where skuid=#{skuid}
select quantity from shoessku where shoesid=#{shoesid} and skuproperty like ${str}
select skuid,quantity from shoessku where shoesid=#{shoesid} and skuproperty like ${str}
select sum(quantity) from shoessku where shoesid=#{shoesid} and skuproperty like ${str}
select shoesdetails from shoes where shoesid=#{shoesid}
select picaddress from shoespic where shoesid=#{shoesid}
select catalogid from shoes where shoesid=#{shoesid}
select catalogname,parentid from shoescatalog where catalogid=#{catalogid}
select sum(quantity) from shoessku where shoesid=#{shoesid}
select sum(quantity) from shoessku where shoesid=#{shoesid} and skuproperty like ${cdn}

select shoes.shoesid,shoes.shoesname,(select shoessku.price from shoessku where shoes.shoesid = shoessku.shoesid GROUP BY shoes.shoesid) AS price, (select sum(shoessku.quantity) from shoessku where shoes.shoesid = shoessku.shoesid) AS shoessku, (SELECT picaddress from shoespic where shoes.shoesid = shoespic.shoesid GROUP BY shoesid) AS shoespic from shoes ,shoessku ,shoespic where shoessku.quantity > 0 GROUP BY shoesid
select * from shoessku where shoesid=#{shoesid}
select count(shoesid) from shoessku where shoesid=#{shoesid}
select sum(quantity) from shoessku where shoesid=#{shoesid}

select e.ticketprice,e.shoesid,e.shoesname,sum(e.skusales),shoes.isdropoff,shoes.adddate from shoes inner join (select d.ticketprice,d.shoesid,c.shoesname,d.skusales,c.state,c.validity from shoessku d inner join (select b.skuid,b.shoesname,a.buydate,a.state,a.validity from shoesorder a inner join orderdetail b on a.orderid = b.orderid) c on d.skuid = c.skuid) as e on shoes.shoesid = e.shoesid where e.state = 3 and e.validity = 1 and shoes.isdropoff=1 GROUP BY (e.shoesid) order by sum(e.skusales) desc limit #{count}
